food.title: JERK CHICKEN SANDWICH
food.description: Hand-pulled jerk chicken and melted pepper jack cheese stacked high on toasted Cuban bread, served with a side of jerk BBQ sauce.

food.title: CUBAN SANDWICH
food.description: Ham, roasted pork, salami, Swiss cheese, lettuce, tomato, pickles, hot-pressed on Cuban bread.

food.title: GRILLED CHICKEN BREAST SANDWICH
food.description: Served on a toasted brioche bun with lettuce, sliced onions and vine-ripened tomato.

food.title: BBQ BACON & CHEESE BURGER
food.description: Glazed with our signature guava BBQ sauce, Applewood-smoked bacon, melted pepper jack cheese, cole slaw and crisp fried onion strings on a toasted brioche bun.

food.title: APPLEWOOD BACON & CHEDDAR BURGER
food.description: Applewood-smoked bacon, melted cheddar cheese, crisp pickle slices, vine-ripened tomato, shaved red onions, Bibb lettuce, on a toasted brioche bun.

food.title: GRILLED BURGER
food.description: Grilled and served with Bibb lettuce, vine-ripened tomato, shaved red onions, crisp pickle slices on a toasted brioche bun.

food.title: SHRIMP & MAHI WITH LEMONGRASS SAUCE
food.description: Sautéed Mahi Mahi, shrimp, shiitake mushrooms, bok choy, sugar snap peas, edamame and bell peppers in a zesty coconut lemongrass sauce served over white rice.

food.title: KEY WEST FISH TACOS
food.description: Flour tortillas filled with sautéed fish, tomato salsa, cabbage-jicama slaw and a side of guacamole. Served with a side of fries.
